alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cleburne; Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Calhoun, east central Etowah and central Cleburne Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ballplay to near Jacksonville State University to 8 miles northwest of Edwardsville. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anniston, Jacksonville, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, Heflin, Fort McClellan, Saks, Weaver, Ballplay, Jacksonville State University, Alexandria, Sweetwater Lake, Choccolocco, Knightens Crossroads, Sulphur Springs and Reaves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
